caseTitle: ADU KOFI DJIN v SEIDU MUSA
summary: Osu Stool v Unilever (Gh) Limited (Civil Appeal No. J4/2/2006, 17th May 2006) is an unreported civil appeal before the Supreme Court of Ghana concerning a dispute over stool land involving the Osu Stool and Unilever (Ghana) Limited. The case likely revolves around customary land ownership, property rights, and the legal relationship between traditional authorities and corporate entities. As an unreported decision, the full reasoning and outcome are not publicly accessible, but it forms part of Ghanaâ€™s evolving jurisprudence on customary land law.
